title: Added change log and initial contributing doc
Removed libsodium; Made hashes more generic
Wasm
body:
To test that this works you use the following command.

`cargo build --no-default-features --features=wasm --target-wasm32-unknown-unknown`

title: clippy
body:
Fixes from applying `cargo clippy` to lint  code.

Signed-off-by: Michael Lodder <redmike7@gmail.com>

title: Added rust implementation for BigNumber
body:
This PR adds a pure rust big number implementation.
This is the last step to being able to build WASM for the CL module.

title: Z mix
body:
This PR addresses:

- Removes AMCL folder and uses the crate
- Merges crypto-lib and z-mix
- Adds instruction text
- Adds docker files
- Cleans up the read me

title: CWE-325: Missing Required Cryptographic Step.
body:
indy-crypto-deps.zip 
hash: f2bcfe3523201d836e6c3cdaf8189aebf1a68a19

Description

The software does not implement a required step in a cryptographic algorithm, resulting in weaker encryption than advertised by that algorithm.
Context

The Phase identifies a point in the software life cycle at which introduction may occur, while the Note provides a typical scenario related to introduction during the given phase.

title: Update +sudo labels README.md
body: add parms SUDOrs and adjusted name for Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.

title: IndyCrypto history for URSA
body: This PR is append for @mikelodder7 effort about migration https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-crypto to URSA.
